locutie.beschrijving: The sermon addresses the tension between secular intellectualism (NYC context) and the prophetic call of Ezekiel. It focuses on the nature of God's Word as performative and the promise of restoration.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: Strong. Focuses on the 'Mortal' (Son of Man) distinction and the sequence of vision/audition in Ezekiel.

illocutie.beschrijving: The preacher intends to validate the struggle of the believer against secularism while asserting the objective reality of God's speech.
voorbeelden: I realize now as never before that the polite silence... is actually a mask.
The Word of God is performative.

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: Strengthening the hearer's resolve; shifting from intellectual doubt to imaginative reception.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Implicit. The preacher mentions the Spirit in the text of Ezekiel but less so as the active agent of the current sermon event.

voorbeelden: God is not a deity who shows up in visions.
The Bible wants to be read like a story.
He stands three times removed from actually seeing God.
Read it when you go home!
I find these words very comforting.
It shakes my faith every time.
I will sprinkle clean water upon you.
A new heart I will give you.
I will put my spirit within you.
commissieven.kwaliteit: High, but largely nested within biblical quotes rather than direct preacher-to-hearer address.

voorbeelden: Tonight, you hear the voice of One speaking.
This is the Word of God.
declaratieven.autoriteit: Moderate; the preacher identifies the sermon as the Word but stops short of 'I forgive you' style declarations.

indicatoren: Extensive discussion about Freud and the Jewish therapist.
Theological lecturing on Karl Barth's volumes.
Explaining the mechanics of Ezekiel's vision.
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer is well-informed and intellectually validated, but remains an observer of Ezekiel's experience rather than a participant in a new reality.

missende_elementen: Direct commissioning of the specific congregation in the 2nd person.
performatief_deficit_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: A sense of 'waiting' for the Word to act rather than the Word acting immediately.

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: Strongly biblical, but framed as 'God's promises to the exiles' which are then applied to the hearer.
voorbeelden: I will take out of your flesh the heart of stone.

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Direct address to the NYC professionals.
tweede_persoon.performatieve_context: Used to bridge the gap between the text and the 'secular city' reality.

derde_persoon.gebruik: Describing Ezekiel, God, Freud, and the Israelites.
derde_persoon.distantie_effect: Creates a narrative distance that requires a 'leap' to the present.

verleden_tijd.gebruik: Ezekiel's history and the preacher's conversations.

tijdloos_present.gebruik: Theological truths about the nature of the Bible.

foutief_patroon.beschrijving: The sermon avoids moralistic 'Assertive -> Directive' traps.

sacramenteel_patroon.beschrijving: Moves from the problem of secularism (Assertive) to the Promise of the New Heart (Commissive).
voorbeelden: The transition from the 'evolutionary ladder' to 'I will give you a new heart'.
sacramenteel_patroon.kwaliteit: Theologically sound but rhetorically heavy on the 'talking about' the Word's power.

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: Because God is faithful... receive this Word.

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon functions as a high-level intellectual comfort, assuring the hearer that faith is not 'pre-evolutionary' but based on a speaking God.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The Word of God is performative.
sterke_punten.effect: Establishes the possibility of an event.

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: Lengthy discussion of Freud and Barth.
zwakke_punten.probleem: Delays the actual encounter with the Word.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: The sermon becomes an event in the final third when the promises of Ezekiel 36 are directly applied.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: Relies on the 'story' power rather than the 'declarative' authority of the preacher's office.

openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: Explicitly stated: 'Tonight, you hear the voice of One speaking.'
tekstueel_bewijs: This is the Word of God.

pneumatologie.geest_rol_erkend: Yes, via the text of Ezekiel.
pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: Yes, 'receive in your heart' is treated as a gift.
tekstueel_bewijs: I will put my spirit within you.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: High. The preacher views the Word as 'making itself happen'.
sacramentstheologie.epifanisch_taalgebruik: Strong in the description of the 'appearance of the likeness'.
tekstueel_bewijs: The Word of God is performative.

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: Too many 'talking about' verbs (realize, think, understand) in the first half.

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: The meaning of this is that we wouldnâ€™t have a clue about the God...
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: Because God has spoken, you are no longer in the dark.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Shifts from a general theological truth to a direct address of the hearer's condition.

toezegging_versterking.probleem: Promises are mostly quoted as 'God said to them'.
toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Use more 'God says to you today'.
voorbeeldzinnen: To you, in New York City, God promises: I will give you a new heart.

adressering_verbetering.suggestie: The address is already quite good.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A sophisticated sermon that successfully uses SAT to explain itself, though it occasionally falls into the trap of explaining the 'event' rather than just letting the 'event' happen.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: The sermon isn't just sharing 'information' or 'self-revelation'; it claims to be the 'Voice of One speaking' (Mandate).
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: The power is attributed to the 'performative Word' rather than the preacher's cleverness.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: The preacher explicitly uses the term 'performative', showing a meta-awareness of the theory.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: The Word of God is performative.
kernzinnen_analyse.illocutionaire_kracht: Defining the nature of the sermon.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: Tonight, you hear the voice of One speaking.
kernzinnen_analyse.illocutionaire_kracht: Claiming the present moment as a divine encounter.

appendices.notities: The sermon is a rare example of a preacher using SAT terminology within the sermon itself.
